data.eml:eml: Eucamaragnathus desenderi, a new ground beetle species from Africa (Coleoptera, Carabidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Assmann, Thorsten, Drees, Claudia, Matern, Andrea, Schuldt, Andreas (2011): Eucamaragnathus desenderi, a new ground beetle species from Africa (Coleoptera, Carabidae). ZooKeys 100: 37-46, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.100.1521, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.100.1521
